content.text:
# Analysis of the Main Target Image

The target image shows two distinct structures:

## Structure 1: Chair-like Structure (left side)
- Total blocks: 6
- Layers: 4 (from bottom to top)
- Composition:
  - Bottom layer: Two vertical green rectangular blocks as legs
  - Second layer: One horizontal yellow rectangular block as the seat
  - Third layer: One red cube, followed by one blue cube stacked on top
  - Top layer: One yellow dome-shaped block on the very top

## Structure 2: Vehicle-like Structure (right side)
- Total blocks: 4
- Layers: 2
- Composition:
  - Bottom layer: Two horizontal orange cylinders as wheels/base
  - Top layer: One horizontal yellow rectangular block with a yellow dome-shaped block on the right end
  - A separate blue cube stands nearby

# Required Blocks from Dictionary

For Structure 1 (Chair):
- Block 4 (vertical green rectangular block) x2 for the legs
- Block 6 (horizontal yellow rectangular block) for the seat
- Block 3 (red cube) for the middle section
- Block 1 (blue cube) for the upper section
- Block 11 (yellow dome) for the top cap

For Structure 2 (Vehicle):
- Block 10 (horizontal orange cylinder) x2 for the wheels
- Block 6 (horizontal yellow rectangular block) for the body
- Block 12 (yellow dome) for the right end
- Block 1 (blue cube) for the separate cube

# Assembly Order
```
{
  Step1: Move block with index 4
  Step2: Move block with index 4
  Step3: Move block with index 6
  Step4: Move block with index 3
  Step5: Move block with index 1
  Step6: Move block with index 11
  Step7: Move block with index 10
  Step8: Move block with index 10
  Step9: Move block with index 6
  Step10: Move block with index 12
  Step11: Move block with index 1
}
```

This assembly sequence first builds the chair-like structure (steps 1-6), followed by the vehicle-like structure (steps 7-10), and finally places the separate blue cube (step 11).
